SignIn.title: Sign in
SignIn.description: Enter your email and password below to sign in
SignIn.unknownError: Unknown error. Please contact system administrator
SignIn.signUpLink: Don't have an account? Sign up

SignUp.title: Create an account

SignUp.invalidPassword: Password must contain at least 8 characters
SignUp.unknownError: Unknown error. Please contact system administrator
SignUp.signInLink: Already have an account? Sign in
SignUp.verifyEmail: Verify email sent. Please check your inbox.

VerifyEmail.title: Check your email
VerifyEmail.emailSent: We've sent a verification link to your email.
VerifyEmail.emailSentTo: We've sent a verification link to email <bold>{email}</bold>.
VerifyEmail.successDescription: Thank you for verifying your email.
VerifyEmail.failedDescription: This token is not valid or might be expired. Please try again.
